text:
getContentAsDOM will always return a Document node no matter what is stored.

This causes incompatiblity issues with other implementations that return the an
Element node when an Element is added via setContentAsDOM.

This also mean that it is not possible to retrieve a text node asDOM.
creator: kevin@rocketred.com.au
nshilenkova@gmail.com
text: Oops. The attachement was supposed to be for the bug #19203.
